title: Shotgun Only
challenge: You're only allowed to use shotguns the whole game.

title: Melee Weapon Only
challenge: You're only allowed to use a melee weapon the whole game.

title: One House
challenge: You're only allowed to loot 1 house, but your allowed to loot dead bodies.

title: Airdrop Only
challenge: You're only allowed to open airdrops for stuff, but allowed to loot deadbodies.

title: Beep Beep
challenge: You're only allowed to kill people with vehicles.

title: Switch
challenge: When you killed someone you have to switch your whole inventory with the dead body.

title: Road Warrior
challenge: You can only stay on the roads

title: One Magazine
challenge: You cannot carry more than one mag for each weapon

title: Warning Shots
challenge: You have to shoot 3 bullets in the air before killing someone

title: The World War Experience
challenge: You have to shoot 3 bullets in the air before killing someone

title: One House to Rule them all
challenge: You are only allowed to loot one house, all other loot can only be received from dead bodies, you may go to ONE other house only if no gun was found in the first one.

title: Drive By Shooter
challenge: one designated driver, Everyone else must shoot from within the vehicle

title: Mad Max
challenge: Each player must locate their own vehicle until an intimidating 4-car squad is complete. All 4 must travel together and may help each other collect gasoline.

title: Rendezvous
challenge: All four players parachute into separate corners of the map. They must reunite before the final 3 circles. Voice chat highly encouraged.
